>[Dragon cavern.]

In this rather large study you see enough arcane reading material to keep you occupied for quite some time. It is apparent that Norius'a has spent many hours here poring over her vast collection of prose and poetry. The room is built for comfort; not only for the Imperial, but for her Secian friends as well.  An antique maple escritoire, a crystalla glass of magnification, a closed rune covered rosewood traveling trunk, and a tiny soft pallet are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Miriel the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Domi the Secian, Voskresenieye the Drake (seated), and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: southwest* west* northwest*.

Miriel looks like a 1'5" standard young delicate boned, stocky bodied Secian.
She has short, wavy, baby fine golden blonde hair, with ruby red eyes, and looks spotless.
She appears to be wary right now.
She bears the mark of Rinanni.
She can be attacked by other players.

On her wings is a soft sheen of stardust, and the edges are adorned with myriad opals and moonstones, gleaming incandescent.

She appears to be in perfect health.

Physical appearance:

A female Secian gazes intensely back at you, her gem-like eyes sparkling with youthful innocence.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. Attkayet'a looks like a 16'6" standard 3rd stage, winged heavy boned, muscular bodied brass Dragon.
She is bald, with large silvery eyes, and looks razor-sharp.
She appears to be aristocratic right now.
She can be attacked by other players.
She appears to be in perfect health.
There is a shining gold emblem affixed to her clothing.

Physical appearance:

Her deliberate motions startle: flexible stone, and unnaturally agile, a leviathan metal statue come to unexpected life. Smoke wreaths around her head; silver eyes are half closed into long, hypnotic slits. Her belly is grossly distended.

                        Visible Equipment
A small glistening orichalcum mark of the ancients (around neck)
A brass ring                                       (ring (right))
A strangely glowing ring                           (ring (left))
A brass ring                                       (ring (left))

  Noble of the Realm

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Darrow the Secian, Relawen the Drake, Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), Chip the Secian, and Kalessin the Noble Drake.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

*->Energy begins to crackle down the length of Aelestithiel's arms.

*->Miriel briefly touches Aeslyn.
[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.
>

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground) and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

l
>[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Relawen the Drake, Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, and Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard).
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Relawen the Drake, Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, and Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard).
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st massive green wyvern.
Obvious paths: None.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Kalessin the Noble Drake (flying 15 feet above ground).
Obvious paths: None.
>There is nothing underneath that.
>There is nothing behind that.
>There is nothing on top of that.
>There is nothing inside that.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground).
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), and Relawen the Drake.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Here, in the center of the massive lair, is Norius'a's hoard. The number of gems here is astounding; they seem to glow in the dim torchlight. Massive tree roots have been trained into a complex, web-like network overhead. Tiny round pillows in many brilliant colors are placed in various spots all around the room, evidently for the comfort of visiting Secians.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* south* west*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Kalessin the Noble Drake, Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground), Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), and Relawen the Drake.

[Dragon cavern.]

In this rather large study you see enough arcane reading material to keep you occupied for quite some time. It is apparent that Norius'a has spent many hours here poring over her vast collection of prose and poetry. The room is built for comfort; not only for the Imperial, but for her Secian friends as well.  An antique maple escritoire, a crystalla glass of magnification, a closed rune covered rosewood traveling trunk, and a tiny soft pallet are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southwest* west* northwest*.
>*->Meonok whistles.

[Dragon cavern.]

It is in this small, round room that Norius'a spends her most private moments. It is covered from wall to wall with the thickest, most luxurious fur you've ever seen or felt. While it is inviting, it seems a breach of her privacy to be standing here.  An indigo embroidered silk pillow is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground) and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.
>*->Energy begins to crackle down the length of Gellidus's arms.
*->Elindalian wildflowers begin to blossom all around Aliyah!

*->The shot is a decent blow to the torso.
*->Kavita begins to trace a ring of golden runes in the air before her.
*->Roknar swings his two-handed black emiel serrated pick axe at the green wyvern!
*->The swing is a good blow to the right arm.
*->The glistening droplets of acid surge into a massive bolt of green energy, which flies out and strikes the green wyvern!  
*->The acid bolt explodes into hundreds of drops which quickly dissolve!
*->A rippling bolt of energy shoots from Gellidus's hands and slams into the green wyvern!
*->The dragon bolt quickly dissipates.

*->The attack misses.

[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Kalessin the Noble Drake (flying 10 feet above ground).
Obvious paths: None.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground) and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

*->Draffut is suddenly showered upon by luminous droplets of healing rain!

*->The shot misses its target.

*->The acid bolt explodes into hundreds of drops which quickly dissolve!

*->But the runes quickly fly apart after being called!
[Dragon cavern.]

Here, in the center of the massive lair, is Norius'a's hoard. The number of gems here is astounding; they seem to glow in the dim torchlight. Massive tree roots have been trained into a complex, web-like network overhead. Tiny round pillows in many brilliant colors are placed in various spots all around the room, evidently for the comfort of visiting Secians.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* south* west*.
n
>[Dragon cavern.]

Incense fills the air in this small room, so thick it is difficult to see. On the far wall, set into a niche, sits a single, massive gem unlike any you've ever seen before. It is faceted like a diamond, yet its surface gleams with a swirling, opalescent shimmer. It almost looks alive. Flanking the niche on either side are a pair of stone dragons.  A mysterious shimmering diamond is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* south* southwest*.
sw
>[Dragon cavern.]

It is in this small, round room that Norius'a spends her most private moments. It is covered from wall to wall with the thickest, most luxurious fur you've ever seen or felt. While it is inviting, it seems a breach of her privacy to be standing here.  An indigo embroidered silk pillow is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: northeast* east* southeast*.
se
>[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground) and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

In this rather large study you see enough arcane reading material to keep you occupied for quite some time. It is apparent that Norius'a has spent many hours here poring over her vast collection of prose and poetry. The room is built for comfort; not only for the Imperial, but for her Secian friends as well.  An antique maple escritoire, a crystalla glass of magnification, a closed rune covered rosewood traveling trunk, and a tiny soft pallet are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Kalessin the Noble Drake (flying 10 feet above ground).
Obvious paths: None.

>[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a tarnished steel chainmail coif, a hooded grey wool jacket, and a gleaming golden nugget are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Domi the Secian, Gellidus the Drake, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Aelestithiel the Noble Drake, Pluck the Secian (flying 10 feet above ground and holding a glowing massive platinum cigar-smoking drake), Relawen the Drake, Hott the Noble Leuian, Java the Leuian, Lilioth the Secian, and Lilyth the Noble Secian (flying 15 feet above ground).
Obvious paths: north northeast east* southeast south southwest* west northwest.

go ho
[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above ground) and Linneastrylon the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: None.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a tarnished steel chainmail coif, and a hooded grey wool jacket are here.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and a tarnished steel chainmail coif are here.

This area is illuminated.

Welcome to Dragon's Gate, Glinka!

Good evening! The stars sparkle like tiny gems in the evening sky.
The weather is currently clear and winds are calm.
The waning (2nd quarter) moon is shining brightly.

The area brightens.

Chip just appeared.

Smite just appeared.  Accompanied by a pink potbelly pig.
[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Domi the Secian, Castin the Anthian, Attkayet'a the Dragon, Gellidus the Drake, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), and Smite the Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east southeast south southwest* west northwest.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Domi the Secian, Castin the Anthian, Attkayet'a the Dragon, Gellidus the Drake, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Meliya the Noble Secian, Miriel the Secian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Orianna the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Kavita the Noble Secian, Orlando the Noble Human, Lilioth the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Tygrus the Leuian, and Kristiona the Noble Leuian.
Obvious paths: north northeast east southeast south southwest west northwest.

The area brightens.
[Open plains]

The trees give way to lush grasses and wildflowers to the north, northeast and east. The ground is irregular and in places, rather bumpy. The cause of the irregularity is unseen. A doe and her fawn leap from their grassy bed and bolt away at your coming.  A broken and cracked steelwood tree, a broken and cracked steelwood tree, and a towering mound of freshly dug earth are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Meliya the Noble Secian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Orianna the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Kavita the Noble Secian, Orlando the Noble Human, Tygrus the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Gideon the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Vermithrax the Drake (flying beside you), Batch the Noble Hithual, and Java the Leuian.
Obvious paths: north northeast* east southwest.

The area brightens.
[Forest Path.]

The path forks to the northwest and northeast. You spot the tracks of a deer, and looking around, notice the antler-scraped bark of a nearby tree. The healthy smell of the forest surrounds you, but the hill to the southwest keeps you from enjoying it.  A broken and cracked steelwood tree is here.

This area is illuminated.

The area brightens.
[Bend in forest path.]

The path bends to the northwest and northeast here, skirting the foot of the hill. The stream bubbles along seemingly unaffected by the loathsome presence of the hill. Moss, lichen and ferns cover the ground, making for a soft bed, if you dared to sleep.  A clear mossy river and an ivy entwined wooden gazebo are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).

Roknar nods.
[Bend in forest path.]

The path bends to the northwest and northeast here, skirting the foot of the hill. The stream bubbles along seemingly unaffected by the loathsome presence of the hill. Moss, lichen and ferns cover the ground, making for a soft bed, if you dared to sleep.  A clear mossy river and an ivy entwined wooden gazebo are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Meliya the Noble Secian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Orianna the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Kavita the Noble Secian, Orlando the Noble Human, Tygrus the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Gideon the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Vermithrax the Drake (flying beside you), Batch the Noble Hithual, and Java the Leuian.
Obvious paths: northeast northwest.

The area brightens.
[Branch in forest path.]

The path branches again, finally leading away from the hill. Your feet and legs are getting damp as the wet ferns brush against your legs. The trees open up slightly here and you think it would be a nice place to rest, if it weren't for the hill.  Some lush ferns are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Forest stream.]

[Hope's Path.]

A small stream runs noisily under the two bridges spanning the ravine. A number of the brunt oaks still stand about, memorials to the forest this once was. A number of small saplings dot the ground between the black trunks. Between the stream bank and oaks, a small path of four-leaf-clover shaped stones weave a windy path through the forest.  A stone bridge, a wooden bridge, a clump of wildgrass, and a small winding stone path are here.

[Hope's Path.]

The path of four leaf clove shaped flagstones leads past a small clean shack and into a well formed tunnel through the thorn bushes to the east and the Caersech to the west. The small shack is set back from the road, its walls built of a whitewashed birch. A sturdy corral, filled with well-fed horses, stands to the left of the shack. A matched pair of dapple grays stand in front of the shack waiting to take their human baggage to their destination. To the left of the door, behind a small paned window, a beautiful Fir Elf female takes coin and in return, with a charming smile, directs those who have paid their fare into the waiting room.  A small shack, a freshly painted sign, a notice of non-refund, and a small winding stone pathway are here.

[Hope's Path.]

Contrasting starkly with the ashes of the forest and brush is a freshly constructed set of stairs that wraps itself about the large tree. The intricate woodwork that decorates the steps is of the finest quality, as if in parody to the blackened destruction of the hedges and brambles around the base of the trunk. Bright green leaves of clover have begun springing up through the ashy soil in conjunction with soft moss to lend a durable cushion to this well-traveled spot.  Some steps circling the tree, a freshly painted wooden sign, a healthy green patch of clover, a flowing marble fountain, and some clover shaped stones are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).

You follow Draffut through some steps circling the tree...

[Gaspar's Grog and Grub.]

Four sturdy walls and a roof of woven branches enclose this small tavern. From the forest floor, winding their way around the trunk of the Mother Tree, a set of intricately railed steps serve as the entrance and exit of the town of Treehaven. Strangers arriving at the top of the steps find themselves under the watchful eye of patrons seated at tables positioned about the light, airy room. A set of oak steps lead up to the new Council chambers.  An ivory inlaid pine bar, a wooden stool, a long weathered wooden bench, a long musty wooden table, some steps circling the tree, some freshly crafted oak steps, an open door, a paper covered posting board, and a gilt framed painting on the wall are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).
In the room are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Meliya the Noble Secian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Orianna the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Kavita the Noble Secian, Orlando the Noble Human, Tygrus the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Gideon the Noble Anthian (flying 5 feet below you), Vermithrax the Drake (flying beside you), Batch the Noble Hithual, and Java the Leuian.
Obvious exits: None.

You follow Draffut through some steps circling the tree...

[Steps.]

The latticework surrounding and covering the spiral staircase is finely crafted.  The intertwining beams seem to weave a delicate pattern above you, accenting the view of the forest floor. The view of burned trees and the scorched structure of the fallen inn spoils the otherwise wondrous scene.  Some steps circling the tree are here.

Obvious paths: None.

You follow Draffut through some steps circling the tree...

[Hope's Path.]

Contrasting starkly with the ashes of the forest and brush is a freshly constructed set of stairs that wraps itself about the large tree. The intricate woodwork that decorates the steps is of the finest quality, as if in parody to the blackened destruction of the hedges and brambles around the base of the trunk. Bright green leaves of clover have begun springing up through the ashy soil in conjunction with soft moss to lend a durable cushion to this well-traveled spot.  Some steps circling the tree, a freshly painted wooden sign, a healthy green patch of clover, a flowing marble fountain, and some clover shaped stones are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).

The area brightens.
[Hope's Path.]

The path of four leaf clove shaped flagstones leads past a small clean shack and into a well formed tunnel through the thorn bushes to the east and the Caersech to the west. The small shack is set back from the road, its walls built of a whitewashed birch. A sturdy corral, filled with well-fed horses, stands to the left of the shack. A matched pair of dapple grays stand in front of the shack waiting to take their human baggage to their destination. To the left of the door, behind a small paned window, a beautiful Fir Elf female takes coin and in return, with a charming smile, directs those who have paid their fare into the waiting room.  A small shack, a freshly painted sign, a notice of non-refund, and a small winding stone pathway are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar).

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and an open weathered leather pouch are here.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and an open weathered leather pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black cat (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st white tailed doe.
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Dror the Noble Thugian, Meonok the Noble Psycian, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Mirrdae the Drake, Erich the Leuian, Audun the Noble Leuian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Kavita the Noble Secian, Lilioth the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Tygrus the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Vermithrax the Drake (flying beside you), Hott the Noble Leuian, Batch the Noble Hithual, Jolanar the Novice Leuian, Kandil the Leuian, Romilin the Noble Psycian, and Rhyne the Noble Leuian.
Obvious paths: north northeast east southeast south southwest west northwest.
>
The white tailed doe whinnies loudly.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Meliya the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: None.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet below you), Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Morgahnn the Drake, and Relawen the Drake.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet below you), Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), and Relawen the Drake.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet below you), Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Meliya the Noble Secian, and Relawen the Drake.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Here, in the center of the massive lair, is Norius'a's hoard. The number of gems here is astounding; they seem to glow in the dim torchlight. Massive tree roots have been trained into a complex, web-like network overhead. Tiny round pillows in many brilliant colors are placed in various spots all around the room, evidently for the comfort of visiting Secians.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* south* west*.
n
>[Dragon cavern.]

Incense fills the air in this small room, so thick it is difficult to see. On the far wall, set into a niche, sits a single, massive gem unlike any you've ever seen before. It is faceted like a diamond, yet its surface gleams with a swirling, opalescent shimmer. It almost looks alive. Flanking the niche on either side are a pair of stone dragons.  A mysterious shimmering diamond is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Domi the Secian, Attkayet'a the Dragon, Gellidus the Drake, Miriel the Secian, Aelestithiel the Noble Drake, and Lilyth the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet above you).
Obvious paths: southeast* south* southwest*.
>
Aelestithiel asks Domi in Secian, "where?"

Attkayet'a says in Secian, "And if the lair was still viable."

Glinka says, " my bad"

Attkayet'a says in Secian, "As it is not."

Domi says in Secian, "oh"

Miriel grins.

Gellidus says to Attkayet'a, "It still is"
' outside again

Glinka says, " outside again"
>
Aelestithiel nods.

[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ceresina the Noble Secian (flying 5 feet below you).
Obvious paths: north* northeast* northwest*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic.  A slightly vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a vine-covered semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, and a widened opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Meliya the Noble Secian.
Obvious paths: None.
go wi
>[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and an open weathered leather pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and an open weathered leather pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black cat (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st massive green wyvern, the 2nd massive green wyvern, the 3rd massive green wyvern, the 4th massive green wyvern, the 1st green wyvern, the 2nd green wyvern, and the 3rd green wyvern.

l
[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, and an open weathered leather pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black cat (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st massive green wyvern, the 2nd massive green wyvern, the 3rd massive green wyvern, the 4th massive green wyvern, the 1st green wyvern, the 2nd green wyvern, the 3rd green wyvern, and the 4th green wyvern.
In the area are Layana the Secian, Equality the Noble Secian, Dror the Noble Thugian, Tchori the Leuian, Meonok the Noble Psycian, Tau the Leuian, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Smite the Oog-ra, Draffut the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Mirrdae the Drake, Erich the Leuian, Audun the Noble Leuian, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Darrow the Secian, Osire the Noble Hithual, Roknar the Noble Human, Morgahnn the Drake, Kavita the Noble Secian, Lilioth the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Tygrus the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Vermithrax the Drake (seated), Hott the Noble Leuian, Relawen the Drake, Batch the Noble Hithual, Jolanar the Novice Leuian, Kandil the Leuian, Romilin the Noble Psycian, Ronan the Hithual, Pluck the Secian (flying 10 feet above you and holding a glowing massive platinum cigar-smoking drake), Rhyne the Noble Leuian (seated), and Tiruna the Noble Leuian.

smi wryly as she steps from the shadows...
Welcome to Dragon's Gate, Glinka!

Good evening! The stars sparkle like tiny gems in the evening sky.
The weather is currently clear and winds are calm.
The waning (2nd quarter) moon is shining brightly.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st massive green wyvern, the 1st green wyvern, the 1st young green wyvern, the 2nd young green wyvern, the 3rd young green wyvern, and the 2nd massive green wyvern.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st white tailed doe.

>[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, and a newly excavated opening are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. [Caersech plains.]

The plains begin to slope upward toward the north here near the western edge of the plains.  Looking up to the north you can see the tops of snowcapped peaks beyond the foothills. You occasionally must step over rusted hunks of metal.  Hmm, what are they?

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st young green wyvern, the 2nd young green wyvern, the 1st massive green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Erich the Leuian, Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Layana the Secian, Stanrar the Noble Human, Kandil the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Darrow the Secian, Osire the Noble Hithual, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Equality the Noble Secian, Mirrdae the Drake, Kavita the Noble Secian, Morgahnn the Drake, Roknar the Noble Human, Meonok the Noble Psycian, Smite the Oog-ra, Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Miriel the Secian, Draffut the Drake, Batch the Noble Hithual, Vermithrax the Drake (flying 10 feet above you), Tau the Leuian, Dror the Noble Thugian, and Tygrus the Leuian.
Obvious paths: north northeast east* southeast south.

[Open plains]

You are near the southern edge of the plains. Butterflies flit across the top of the lush grass here while bees are busy in the wildflowers. The plains teem with life. The breeze from the north brings the scent of the mountain forest to your nose. High above, a freshly painted tree house rests in the leafy canopy darkness of trees in the area. [Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, an open crafted leather bag, a small breathtaking red obsidian bead, a strange glass monocle, and an open pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols. [Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols. [Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a strange glass monocle, a small glistening black pearl, a small obsidian figurine, a battle scarred ebony parrying shield, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, and a short silver playing dart are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st leopard, the 1st white tailed doe, the 1st young green wyvern, and the 2nd young green wyvern.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a strange glass monocle, a small obsidian figurine, a battle scarred ebony parrying shield, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, an ancient jade eyed jackal sigil, a shovel, and a short black talon are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st leopard, the 1st young green wyvern corpse, the 1st green wyvern, the 2nd green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar).

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a strange glass monocle, a small obsidian figurine, a battle scarred ebony parrying shield, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, an ancient jade eyed jackal sigil, and a shovel are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

You wind your way through several mounds here, as well as stepping over a few rusty hunks of metal. The sun shines brightly on the lush grass and the plains teem with life. Still, you can't stop thinking of death. Maybe its the smell on the breeze.  A dead grey mouse, a worn leather money belt, and a tiny shrunken skull pendant are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st green wyvern, the 2nd green wyvern, the 3rd green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Erich the Leuian, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Layana the Secian, Stanrar the Noble Human, Kandil the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Darrow the Secian, Osire the Noble Hithual, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Equality the Noble Secian, Romilin the Noble Psycian, Mirrdae the Drake, Kavita the Noble Secian, Morgahnn the Drake, Roknar the Noble Human, Smite the Oog-ra, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Batch the Noble Hithual, Vermithrax the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Tau the Leuian, Meliya the Noble Secian, Dror the Noble Thugian, and Tygrus the Leuian.
Obvious paths: north south southwest west* northwest.

[Open plains]

You wind your way through several mounds here, as well as stepping over a few rusty hunks of metal. The sun shines brightly on the lush grass and the plains teem with life. Still, you can't stop thinking of death. Maybe its the smell on the breeze.  A dead grey mouse, a worn leather money belt, and a tiny shrunken skull pendant are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st pink potbelly pig (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st timber wolf, the 1st white tailed buck, and the 1st spotted fawn.
In the area are Erich the Leuian, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Layana the Secian, Stanrar the Noble Human, Kandil the Leuian, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Darrow the Secian, Osire the Noble Hithual, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Equality the Noble Secian, Romilin the Noble Psycian, Mirrdae the Drake, Kavita the Noble Secian, Roknar the Noble Human, Smite the Oog-ra, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Batch the Noble Hithual, Tau the Leuian, Meliya the Noble Secian, and Dror the Noble Thugian.
Obvious paths: north south southwest west* northwest.

[Open plains]

Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable.  The smell of an alpine forest drifts from the treeline.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols. [Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a shovel, a short pointy tipped iron letter opener, and some black and gold iron gauntlets are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols. l
[Open plains]

You wind your way through several mounds here, as well as stepping over a few rusty hunks of metal. The sun shines brightly on the lush grass and the plains teem with life. Still, you can't stop thinking of death. Maybe its the smell on the breeze.  A dead grey mouse, a worn leather money belt, a tiny shrunken skull pendant, a quartz inlaid bronze crown, and a tarnished steel chainmail coif are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st massive green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar).

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a shovel, a short pointy tipped iron letter opener, and some black and gold iron gauntlets are here.

This area is illuminated.

>[Open plains]

Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable.  The smell of an alpine forest drifts from the treeline.  A small black coral figurine, a wooden tree branch, a glowing holy mark of Odarous, and a worn leather money belt are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east southeast south* southwest* west.

>[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a shovel, and a short pointy tipped iron letter opener are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st white tailed doe, the 2nd white tailed doe, the 3rd white tailed doe, and the 1st leopard.
In the area are Kalessin the Noble Drake, Romilin the Noble Psycian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Morgahnn the Drake, and Hott the Noble Leuian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east southeast south southwest west* northwest.

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A blackened Dragon runeward, a blackened vine-covered Dragon runeward, a blackened arcane glyph, a blackened semicircle of runewards, a rotting wyvern ribcage, a cracked wyvern skull, a tall mound of soil, an oddly shaped collection of rocks, a jagged mixed earthen conglomerate, a small hole, a cave opening, a widened opening, and an open rotting cloth pouch are here.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Opening up before you is a huge, cavernous room. The walls are hewn from the earth and stone; huge, gnarled tree roots snake their way from top to bottom, looking as if they could reach out and grab you. The floor has been packed down so thoroughly that it nearly shines; it seems some very heavy footsteps have traveled across this floor.  A Cave opening and a tall mound of soil are here.

This area is illuminated.

>[Dragon cavern.]

Here, in the center of the massive lair, is Norius'a's hoard. The number of gems here is astounding; they seem to glow in the dim torchlight. Massive tree roots have been trained into a complex, web-like network overhead. Tiny round pillows in many brilliant colors are placed in various spots all around the room, evidently for the comfort of visiting Secians.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* south* west*.

[Dragon cavern.]

Incense fills the air in this small room, so thick it is difficult to see. On the far wall, set into a niche, sits a single, massive gem unlike any you've ever seen before. It is faceted like a diamond, yet its surface gleams with a swirling, opalescent shimmer. It almost looks alive. Flanking the niche on either side are a pair of stone dragons.  A mysterious shimmering diamond is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a shovel, and a short pointy tipped iron letter opener are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st leopard corpse.
In the area are Erich the Leuian, Linneastrylon the Noble Secian, Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Domi the Secian (holding a flaming ruby tipped elm stave), Layana the Secian (flying beside you), Gellidus the Drake, Stanrar the Noble Human, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Lilioth the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Grysmor the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing sapphire tipped teak staff of mages), Darrow the Secian, Pluck the Secian (flying 10 feet above you and holding a glowing massive platinum cigar-smoking drake), Osire the Noble Hithual, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Equality the Noble Secian (holding a flaming refreshing orange scented candle), Romilin the Noble Psycian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Attkayet'a the Dragon, Mirrdae the Drake, Kavita the Noble Secian, Aelestithiel the Noble Drake, Roknar the Noble Human, Chip the Secian (holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Smite the Oog-ra (lying down), Pollii the Secian (holding a glowing pure white crystal long-stemmed rose), Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Miriel the Secian, Draffut the Drake, Batch the Noble Hithual, Vermithrax the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Tau the Leuian, Meliya the Noble Secian (holding a glowing swirling tornado of desert sand), Losmir the Draco, Dror the Noble Thugian, Relawen the Drake, Kiralyn the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), and Tygrus the Leuian.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a slick hardened snakeskin helm, a pair of soft brown doeskin gloves, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a shovel, and a short pointy tipped iron letter opener are here.

Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable. You wind your way through several mounds here, as well as stepping over a few rusty hunks of metal. The sun shines brightly on the lush grass and the plains teem with life. Still, you can't stop thinking of death. Maybe its the smell on the breeze.

[Open plains]

Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable.  The smell of an alpine forest drifts from the treeline.  A small black coral figurine, a wooden tree branch, a glowing holy mark of Odarous, a worn leather money belt, a tattered weathered newspaper, a pair of ivy embossed leather gloves, some copper studded leather gauntlets, an ugly green troll mask, a gnarled weathered oak branch, and a short steel tent peg are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st massive green wyvern, the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st white tailed buck.
In the area are Linneastrylon the Noble Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing hand-painted glass shadow box), Domi the Secian (holding a flaming ruby tipped elm stave), Layana the Secian (flying beside you), Stanrar the Noble Human, Kristiona the Noble Leuian, Grysmor the Secian (holding a glowing sapphire tipped teak staff of mages), Darrow the Secian, Pluck the Secian (flying 10 feet above you and holding a glowing massive platinum cigar-smoking drake), Osire the Noble Hithual, Aeslyn the Noble Drake, Equality the Noble Secian (holding a flaming refreshing orange scented candle), Kavita the Noble Secian, Morgahnn the Drake, Aelestithiel the Noble Drake, Roknar the Noble Human, Erich the Leuian, Smite the Oog-ra, Noffbrau the Noble Hithual, Miriel the Secian, Draffut the Drake (flying 25 feet above you), Batch the Noble Hithual, Vermithrax the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Scruple the Noble Drag-al (holding a flaming moonsilver oil lamp), Tau the Leuian (a black kitten upon his left shoulder), Meliya the Noble Secian, Tchori the Leuian (hovering 25 feet above you), Ying the Drake, Allonon the Drake (flying 20 feet above you), Dror the Noble Thugian, Kiralyn the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing gold-flecked crystalla shard), Syai the Noble Drake (flying 10 feet above you), and Tygrus the Leuian.

[Open plains]

Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable.  The smell of an alpine forest drifts from the treeline.  A small black coral figurine, a wooden tree branch, a glowing holy mark of Odarous, a worn leather money belt, a tattered weathered newspaper, a pair of ivy embossed leather gloves, some copper studded leather gauntlets, an ugly green troll mask, a gnarled weathered oak branch, and a short steel tent peg are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. Immense fir, redwood and sequoia trees block your path to the north up into the foothills. The ground here is full of rusty metal and small mounds, making the footing somewhat unstable. [Caersech plains.]

The plains begin to slope upward toward the north here near the western edge of the plains.  Looking up to the north you can see the tops of snowcapped peaks beyond the foothills. You occasionally must step over rusted hunks of metal.  Hmm, what are they?  Some silver and gold etched iron gauntlets, a steaming mug of mushroom brew, a worn leather money belt, some hardened lava fragments, and some thick silver-trimmed riding boots are here.

[Caersech plains.]

The plains begin to slope upward toward the north here near the western edge of the plains.  Looking up to the north you can see the tops of snowcapped peaks beyond the foothills. You occasionally must step over rusted hunks of metal.  Hmm, what are they?  Some silver and gold etched iron gauntlets and a worn leather money belt are here.

[Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, some short iron ice tongs, a hardened leather barbuta, a large glossy black coral charm, a wooden club, a dark oiled leather breastplate, a two-handed oak quarterstaff, a battle scarred ebony parrying shield, and a stone tribal pendant are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st thick maned black stallion (wearing a small gold collar), the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar), and the 1st black kitten (wearing a small gold collar).

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. [Dragon cavern.]

Standing before you is a huge wall of thorny roots.  They have doubled back upon themselves so many times that it is impossible to see anything behind them. A strange, slightly familiar scent wafts through here. The encroaching flora makes this spot slightly claustrophobic. [Open plains]

The few lone fir trees that once stood mighty in this open plain have been broken in half and thrown casually to the side. The earth has been ripped up, exposing the dark black soil underneath. Several piles of grass, moss, rocks, and soil are piled in various directions, remnants of the freshly excavated ground. The giant hole leading into the ground reveals a dense curtain of thorny roots, surrounded by a multitude of strange symbols.  A light branch, some broken fir trees, a freshly expanded hole, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of soil, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a towering mound of freshly dug earth, a newly excavated opening, a hardened leather barbuta, a large glossy black coral charm, a dark oiled leather breastplate, a battle scarred ebony parrying shield, and an open striped leopardskin bag are here.

This area is illuminated.
